1.12.0.name: sanitize-html
1.12.0.description: Clean up user-submitted HTML, preserving whitelisted elements and whitelisted attributes on a per-element basis

scripts.build: browserify index.js > dist/sanitize-html.js --standalone 'sanitizeHtml'
scripts.minify: npm run build && uglifyjs dist/sanitize-html.js > dist/sanitize-html.min.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run test && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist

1.19.3.name: sanitize-html
1.19.3.description: Clean up user-submitted HTML, preserving whitelisted elements and whitelisted attributes on a per-element basis

scripts.build: make clean && make all && npm run prepare && browserify dist/index.js > dist/sanitize-html.js --standalone 'sanitizeHtml'
scripts.minify: npm run build && uglifyjs dist/sanitize-html.js > dist/sanitize-html.min.js
